args: Will the green car win the race?

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

addLiquidity().details: Only the owner can add liquidity and only if the prediction is not reported

params._outcome: The possible outcome (YES or NO) to buy tokens for
The possible outcome (YES or NO) to buy tokens for
params._tradingAmount: The amount of tokens to buy

params._outcome: The possible outcome (YES or NO) to sell tokens for
params._tradingAmount: The amount of tokens to sell

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

redeemWinningTokens(uint256).details: Only if the prediction is resolved

params._amount: The amount of winning tokens to redeem

removeLiquidity(uint256).details: Only the owner can remove liquidity and only if the prediction is not reported

params._ethToWithdraw: Amount of ETH to withdraw from liquidity pool

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

report(uint8).details: Only the oracle can report the winning outcome and only if the prediction is not reported

resolveMarketAndWithdraw().details: Only callable by the owner and only if the prediction is resolved

params._outcome: The possible outcome (YES or NO) to sell tokens for
params._tradingAmount: The amount of tokens to sell

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addLiquidity().notice: Add liquidity to the prediction market and mint tokens

buyTokensWithETH(uint8,uint256).notice: Buy prediction outcome tokens with ETH, need to call priceInETH function first to get right amount of tokens to buy

getBuyPriceInEth(uint8,uint256).notice: Calculate the total ETH price for buying tokens

getSellPriceInEth(uint8,uint256).notice: Calculate the total ETH price for selling tokens

redeemWinningTokens(uint256).notice: Redeem winning tokens for ETH after prediction is resolved, winning tokens are burned and user receives ETH

removeLiquidity(uint256).notice: Remove liquidity from the prediction market and burn respective tokens, if you remove liquidity before prediction ends you got no share of lpReserve

report(uint8).notice: Report the winning outcome for the prediction

resolveMarketAndWithdraw().notice: Owner of contract can redeem winning tokens held by the contract after prediction is resolved and get ETH from the contract including LP revenue and collateral back

sellTokensForEth(uint8,uint256).notice: Sell prediction outcome tokens for ETH, need to call priceInETH function first to get right amount of tokens to buy
